headline.print_headline: Education Gap Is an 'Urgent' Civil Rights Issue: George W. Bush
headline.main: Education Gap Is an 'Urgent' Civil Rights Issue: George W. Bush

docs.snippet: Inequality in the U.S. education system favors white children over minorities, the poor and the disabled, making it "one of the most urgent civil rights issues of our time," former President George W. Bush said on Thursday....
docs.lead_paragraph: Inequality in the U.S. education system favors white children over minorities, the poor and the disabled, making it "one of the most urgent civil rights issues of our time," former President George W. Bush said on Thursday.

headline.print_headline: Mexico's Videgaray Urges G20 to Give U.S. Time to OK IMF Reforms
headline.main: Mexico's Videgaray Urges G20 to Give U.S. Time to OK IMF Reforms

docs.snippet: Group of 20 countries should give the United States time to get planned reforms to the International Monetary Fund through Congress and not rush into short-term workarounds, Mexican Finance Minister Luis Videgaray said on Thursday....
docs.lead_paragraph: Group of 20 countries should give the United States time to get planned reforms to the International Monetary Fund through Congress and not rush into short-term workarounds, Mexican Finance Minister Luis Videgaray said on Thursday.

docs.snippet: A strong earthquake damaged dozens of houses in western Nicaragua on Thursday, and authorities said that at least 23 people were injured by falling ceilings, beams and walls in one town....
docs.lead_paragraph: A strong earthquake damaged dozens of houses in western Nicaragua on Thursday, and authorities said that at least 23 people were injured by falling ceilings, beams and walls in one town.

headline.print_headline: Union Advances to Frozen Four Title Game
headline.main: Union Advances to Frozen Four Title Game

docs.snippet: Daniel Ciampini and tiny Union College are thriving on college hockey's biggest stage....
docs.lead_paragraph: Daniel Ciampini and tiny Union College are thriving on college hockey's biggest stage.

headline.print_headline: Judge: California Mistreating Mentally Ill Inmates
headline.main: Judge: California Mistreating Mentally Ill Inmates

docs.snippet: A federal judge ruled Thursday that California's treatment of mentally ill inmates violates constitutional safeguards against cruel and unusual punishment through excessive use of pepper spray and isolation....
docs.lead_paragraph: A federal judge ruled Thursday that California's treatment of mentally ill inmates violates constitutional safeguards against cruel and unusual punishment through excessive use of pepper spray and isolation.

headline.print_headline: Former Connecticut Governor Indicted on Campaign Charges
headline.main: Former Connecticut Governor Indicted on Campaign Charges

docs.snippet: Former Connecticut Governor John Rowland, who spent time in federal prison for corruption, was indicted on Thursday on charges of illegal campaign activities, authorities said....
docs.lead_paragraph: Former Connecticut Governor John Rowland, who spent time in federal prison for corruption, was indicted on Thursday on charges of illegal campaign activities, authorities said.

headline.print_headline: China Should Be Very Cautious With Any Stimulus-Central Bank
headline.main: China Should Be Very Cautious With Any Stimulus-Central Bank

docs.snippet: The Chinese government and central bank should be "very cautious" in implementing any stimulus programs because they tend to be less efficient than natural market forces in boosting growth, a People's Bank of China official said on Thursday....
docs.lead_paragraph: The Chinese government and central bank should be "very cautious" in implementing any stimulus programs because they tend to be less efficient than natural market forces in boosting growth, a People's Bank of China official said on Thursday.

headline.print_headline: Osborne Touts UK Recovery on Return to Sceptical IMF
headline.main: Osborne Touts UK Recovery on Return to Sceptical IMF

docs.snippet: Chancellor George Osborne held up Britain's recent strong pace of economic growth as vindication of his austerity programme that came under fire from the International Monetary Fund last year....
docs.lead_paragraph: Chancellor George Osborne held up Britain's recent strong pace of economic growth as vindication of his austerity programme that came under fire from the International Monetary Fund last year.

headline.print_headline: Manila Will Have to Join Asia-Pacific Trade Bloc One Day-Minister
headline.main: Manila Will Have to Join Asia-Pacific Trade Bloc One Day-Minister

docs.snippet: The Philippines will eventually have to join a market-opening trans-Pacific trade deal currently under negotiation once its market share, jobs and businesses start to suffer because of it, the country's finance minister said on Thursday....
docs.lead_paragraph: The Philippines will eventually have to join a market-opening trans-Pacific trade deal currently under negotiation once its market share, jobs and businesses start to suffer because of it, the country's finance minister said on Thursday.

headline.sub: Forty years of Cyprus' buffer zone
headline.main: Forty years of Cyprus' buffer zone

docs.snippet: Cyprus' buffer zone, the symbol of the island's division, marks 40 years of existence this year. But leaders are attempting to resolve the long-standing divide. Jillian Kitchener reports....
docs.lead_paragraph: Cyprus' buffer zone, the symbol of the island's division, marks 40 years of existence this year. But leaders are attempting to resolve the long-standing divide. Jillian Kitchener reports.
